Detailed Description

Controls drawing and updating all entities in the game and any UI elements.

Author:
Jon Macey, Will Herbert
Version:
1.0
Date:
Last revision 10/05/2015 Updated to comply with doxygen and NCCA coding standard

00452       break;
00453     }
00454     case gamePause:
00455     {
00456       // grab an instance of the shader manager
00457       ngl::ShaderLib *shader=ngl::ShaderLib::instance();
00458       (*shader)["Phong"]->use();
00459 
00460       // Rotation based on the mouse position for our global transform
00461       ngl::Mat4 rotX;
00462       ngl::Mat4 rotY;
00463       // create the rotation matrices
00464       rotX.rotateX(m_spinXFace);
00465       rotY.rotateY(m_spinYFace);
00466       // multiply the rotations
00467       m_mouseGlobalTX=rotY*rotX;
00468       // add the translations
00469       m_mouseGlobalTX.m_m[3][0] = m_modelPos.m_x;
00470       m_mouseGlobalTX.m_m[3][1] = m_modelPos.m_y;
00471       m_mouseGlobalTX.m_m[3][2] = m_modelPos.m_z;
00472       m_gameworld->draw(m_cam, m_mouseGlobalTX);
00473 
00474       m_buttonPause->draw();
00475       m_buttonMenu->draw();
00476 
00477       break;
00478     }
00479     case gameQuit:
00480     {
00481       break;
00482     }
00483     default:
00484     {
00485       std::cout<<"Error: Invalid gameState"<<std::endl;
00486       break;
00487     }
00488   }
00489 }

00900     ngl::Vec4 obj_far=inverse*far;

00903     obj_near/=obj_near.m_w;
00904     obj_far/=obj_far.m_w;

00908

00910     ngl::Vec3 rayDir(farPoint-nearPoint);

00912     {
00913         std::cout<<"Ray Direction in getWorldSpace equals zero, can't normalise"<<std::endl;
00914     }

00916     {

00533     {
00534         m_cam->setEye(ngl::Vec3(cameraLimitX,m_cam->getEye().m_y,m_cam->getEye().m_z));
00535     }
00536     if(m_cam->getEye().m_x< -cameraLimitX)
00537     {
00538         m_cam->setEye(ngl::Vec3(-cameraLimitX,m_cam->getEye().m_y,m_cam->getEye().m_z));
00539     }
00540     if(m_cam->getEye().m_z> cameraLimitZ)
00541     {
00542         m_cam->setEye(ngl::Vec3(m_cam->getEye().m_x,m_cam->getEye().m_y,cameraLimitZ));
00543     }
00544     if(m_cam->getEye().m_z< -cameraLimitZ)
00545     {
00546         m_cam->setEye(ngl::Vec3(m_cam->getEye().m_x,m_cam->getEye().m_y,-cameraLimitZ));
00547     }
00548   }
00549 
00550   //Sets the squad size to the amount selected on the slider
00551   if (m_sliderSquadSize->getIsSliding() == true)
00552   {
00553     m_squadSize = m_sliderSquadSize->slideBar(_event.x);
00554     m_ss.str(std::string());
00555     m_ss << m_squadSize;
00556     m_squadSizeString = m_ss.str();
00557     m_sliderSquadSize->setTextString(m_squadSizeString);  
00558   }

00771   {
00772       m_modelPos.m_y+=(ZOOM*(cameraHeight-m_modelPos.m_y)*0.05);
